title: Valuable land with house
details:
Valuable land with small house, very close to Gampaha city center.

34 Perches Land with Small House at Bandaranayaka Road Asgiriya Gampaha, just 500 meters to Gampaha Minuwangoda Road ( to Malwatta Juntion) 1.3 Km to Gampaha city center & Railway Station.

Backside of the land facing to Paddy-field and Attanagalu oya and 30 Perches paddy-field also included to above land.

This House consists of 1 bedroom, bathroom, kitchen with Dining room, Sitting/ Living area & Veranda .

, Right Round Parapet wall. Has Well water and main line water supply.
